alert.note: Alert for Nevada; Placer (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 30 at 9:58PM PST until January 01 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Reno NV has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in California... Truckee River Near Truckee affecting Nevada and Placer Counties. For the Truckee River...including Truckee...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO SUNDAY MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Truckee River Near Truckee. * WHEN...From late tonight to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 5.5 feet, Flood stage. Minor flooding from Alpine Meadows to Truckee. Minor flooding of landscapes, basements and crawlspaces in low lying properties. Riverside campgrounds may be impacted by flooding from small tributaries and overland flow, but little impact is expected from the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM PST Friday the stage was 4.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 5.6 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 5.2 feet on 02/09/2017. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday evening at 1000 PM PST.
